DataElement.preferredName: Wechsler Preschool and Primary Scale of Intelligence - Fourth Edition Zoo Locations Scaled Score Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of the scaled score for the Zoo Locations subtest in the Wechsler Preschool and Primary Scale of Intelligence, Fourth Edition.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Wechsler Preschool and Primary Scale of Intelligence - Fourth Edition Zoo Locations Subtest Scaled Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The fourth version of the Wechsler Preschool & Primary Scale of Intelligence, published in 2012. It is a test designed for children ages 2 years 6 months to 7 years 3 months that provides subtest and composite scores that represent intellectual functioning in verbal and performance cognitive domains, and provides a composite score that represents a child's general intellectual ability._A subtest of the Wechsler Preschool and Primary Scale of Intelligence, that measures visual as well as spatial dimension skills. Working within a specified time limit, the child views pictures of animals placed on a zoo layout and them must place the proper animal in the correct location._Conversion of a raw score on a test to a common scale that allows for a numerical comparison.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Wechsler Preschool and Primary Scale of Intelligence - Fourth Edition
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The fourth version of the Wechsler Preschool & Primary Scale of Intelligence, published in 2012. It is a test designed for children ages 2 years 6 months to 7 years 3 months that provides subtest and composite scores that represent intellectual functioning in verbal and performance cognitive domains, and provides a composite score that represents a child's general intellectual ability.

Concepts.longName: Wechsler Preschool and Primary Scale of Intelligence - Fourth Edition
Concepts.definition: The fourth version of the Wechsler Preschool & Primary Scale of Intelligence, published in 2012. It is a test designed for children ages 2 years 6 months to 7 years 3 months that provides subtest and composite scores that represent intellectual functioning in verbal and performance cognitive domains, and provides a composite score that represents a child's general intellectual ability.

Property.preferredDefinition: A subtest of the Wechsler Preschool and Primary Scale of Intelligence, that measures visual as well as spatial dimension skills. Working within a specified time limit, the child views pictures of animals placed on a zoo layout and them must place the proper animal in the correct location.:Conversion of a raw score on a test to a common scale that allows for a numerical comparison.

Concepts.definition: A subtest of the Wechsler Preschool and Primary Scale of Intelligence, that measures visual as well as spatial dimension skills. Working within a specified time limit, the child views pictures of animals placed on a zoo layout and them must place the proper animal in the correct location.
Conversion of a raw score on a test to a common scale that allows for a numerical comparison.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity that represents the conversion of a raw score on a test to a common scale in the Wechsler Preschool and Primary Scale of Intelligence - Fourth Edition.
